question: Yo product ko warranty kati cha?
context:
Product: Samsung Galaxy S21
Details: Warranty - 1 year manufacturer warranty.
Replacement Policy - 7 days replacement policy available.
Price: NPR 95,000.
response: Yo product ma 1 barsha ko manufacturer warranty cha ra 7 din ko replacement policy pani available cha.

question: Delivery kati din ma aauchha?
context: Shipping Policy: Standard delivery takes 3-5 working days inside Kathmandu Valley. Outside valley, delivery may take 5-7 working days.
response: Delivery Kathmandu Valley vitra 3-5 working din ma aauchha, ra valley bahira 5-7 working din lagna sakcha.

question: Yo product return garna milcha?
context: Return Policy: Products can be returned within 7 days if unopened and in original condition. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after inspection.
response: Yes, yo product 7 din vitra return garna milcha jaba samma unopened ra original condition ma huncha.

question: Card bata payment garna milcha?
context: Payment Options: We accept payments via Credit/Debit cards, eSewa, and Khalti. Cash on Delivery is also available.
response: Yes, tapai Credit/Debit card ko madat le payment garna saknu huncha.

question: Mero order ko status kasari herne?
context: Order Tracking: You can track your order status by logging into your account and visiting the 'My Orders' section. Alternatively, you can contact customer support.
response: Tapai ko order status 'My Orders' section ma login garera herna saknu huncha, athawa customer support lai samparka garnus.

question: Discount ko offer cha yo product ma?
context:
Product: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
Details: Original Price - NPR 45,000
Discount Offer - 10% off (valid till Jan 15, 2025).
response: Yes, yo product ma 10% discount cha, jun Jan 15, 2025 samma valid cha.

question: Cash on delivery available cha?
context: Payment Options: Cash on Delivery (COD) is available for orders inside Kathmandu Valley only. Prepaid options are required for orders outside the valley.
response: Yes, Kathmandu Valley vitra Cash on Delivery available cha, tara valley bahira prepaid options matra available cha.

question: Mero order cancel garna milcha?
context: Cancellation Policy: Orders can be canceled before they are shipped. Once shipped, cancellation is not allowed. Contact customer support for assistance.
response: Tapai ko order shipment bhanda pahile cancel garna milcha. Shipment bhayepachi cancel garna mildaina. Kripaya customer support lai samparka garnus.

question: Exchange policy kasto cha?
context: Exchange Policy: Products can be exchanged within 10 days if they are defective or damaged upon delivery. Proof of damage is required.
response: Exchange policy anusar, defective ya damaged product delivery bhayeko 10 din vitra exchange garna milcha. Damage ko proof chaiyo.

question: Size change garna milcha?
context:
Product: Nike Running Shoes
Details: Size exchange is allowed within 7 days of delivery if the product is unused and in original packaging.
response: Yes, size change garna milcha, tara product unused ra original packaging ma hunuparcha. Delivery bhayeko 7 din vitra matra exchange garna milcha.

question: Referral discount ko barema thap jankari dinus.
context: Referral Program: Refer a friend and both of you get NPR 500 off on your next purchase. Offer valid only for new users referred through your unique code.
response: Referral program anusar, tapai ra tapai ko mitra duitaile aglo purchase ma NPR 500 discount paunuhunecha. Offer naya users ko lagi valid cha.

question: Product ko color option k-kasto cha?
context:
Product: Apple iPhone 14
Available Colors: Midnight Black, Starlight White, Product Red, Blue, Purple.
response: Yo product ma Midnight Black, Starlight White, Product Red, Blue, ra Purple color option available cha.

question: Gift wrap service cha?
context: Additional Services: Gift wrapping service is available for an extra charge of NPR 150. Customers can select this option at checkout.
response: Yes, gift wrap service available cha, jaslai checkout ma select garna sakincha. Isko charge NPR 150 ho.

question: Product ko rating kati cha?
context:
Product: Xiaomi Redmi Note 12
Customer Reviews: Average rating - 4.5/5 based on 1,200 reviews.
response: Yo product ko rating 4.5/5 ho, 1,200 reviews ko adhar ma.

question: Installation service provide huncha?
context: Installation Service: Free installation is provided for air conditioners, washing machines, and TVs. Please schedule the installation after delivery.
response: Yes, air conditioners, washing machines, ra TVs ko lagi free installation service provide huncha. Delivery pachi schedule garna sakincha.

question: Tracking link kaha pauxa?
context: Order Tracking: Once your order is shipped, a tracking link will be sent to your registered email and phone number.
response: Tapai ko order shipment bhayepachi, tracking link registered email ra phone number ma pathaunecha.

question: International delivery available cha?
context: Shipping Policy: Currently, we deliver only within Nepal. International shipping is not available.
response: Dukhit chaun, hamro international delivery available chaina. Hamile Nepal vitra matra deliver garchau.

question: Flash sale ko offer kahile suru huncha?
context: Promotion Details: Flash Sale starts on January 20, 2025, at 12:00 PM and ends on January 22, 2025, at 11:59 PM. Up to 50% off on selected items.
response: Flash Sale January 20, 2025, ma 12:00 PM dekhi suru hunchha ra January 22, 2025, ko 11:59 PM samma chalcha.

question: Yo product ko dimension kasto cha?
context:
Product: Wooden Dining Table
Dimensions: Length - 150 cm, Width - 90 cm, Height - 75 cm.
response: Yo product ko dimension ho: Length 150 cm, Width 90 cm, ra Height 75 cm.

question: Gift card kinera kasari use garna sakincha?
context: Gift Card Policy: Gift cards can be purchased online and redeemed at checkout by entering the unique gift card code. Validity: 1 year from the date of purchase.
response: Gift card online kinera checkout ma unique code enter garera use garna sakincha. Isko validity 1 barsha ho purchase date dekhi.

question: Membership benefits k-kasto cha?
context: Membership Program: Gold members get free shipping, exclusive discounts, and early access to sales. Silver members get free shipping for orders above NPR 5,000.
response: Gold members lai free shipping, exclusive discounts, ra sales ma early access dincha. Silver members lai NPR 5,000 bhanda mathi ko order ma free shipping dincha.

question: Customized product order garna milcha?
context: Customization Policy: Customized products can be ordered by contacting customer support. Additional charges and extended delivery timelines apply.
response: Yes, customized product order garna milcha. Kripaya customer support lai samparka garnus. Extra charges ra extended delivery timeline lagna sakcha.

question: Yo product return ma paisa kasari refund huncha?
context: Refund Policy: Refunds for returned products will be processed to the original payment method within 5-7 working days after inspection.
response: Returned product ko refund original payment method ma 5-7 working days vitra process huncha.

question: Expired product ko complain kasari garne?
context: Complaint Policy: If you receive an expired product, contact customer support within 3 days of delivery. A replacement or refund will be provided after verification.
response: Aba expired product delivery bhaye 3 din vitra customer support lai samparka garnus. Verification pachi replacement ya refund provide huncha.

question: Email verification garna parcha?
context: Account Verification: Email verification is mandatory for new accounts to enable purchases and receive order updates.
response: Ho, email verification garnu parcha naya account ko lagi, jasle purchases ra order updates enable garcha.

question: Pre-order ko delivery date kahile ho?
context: Pre-order Details: Delivery for pre-ordered items will start from February 10, 2025. Customers will be notified 2 days prior to delivery.
response: Pre-ordered item ko delivery February 10, 2025 dekhi suru huncha. Delivery ko 2 din agadi notification pathaunecha.

question: Mero product damaged delivery vayo, aba ke garne?
context: Damaged Product Policy: For damaged products, please raise a complaint with a photo of the product within 48 hours of delivery. A replacement or refund will be arranged.
response: Damaged product ko lagi 48 ghanta vitra photo sahit complain file garnus. Replacement ya refund arrange garincha.

question: Festival sale ma kun kun product discount ma cha?
context: Festival Sale: Discounts up to 30% on electronics, 40% on fashion, and 50% on home appliances. Valid till January 25, 2025.
response: Festival Sale ma electronics ma 30%, fashion ma 40%, ra home appliances ma 50% discount cha. Offer January 25, 2025 samma valid cha.

question: Mobile app bata order garna k ko benefit cha?
context: Mobile App Benefits: Get an extra 5% off on every order placed via the mobile app. App-exclusive deals and faster checkout experience.
response: Mobile app bata order gareko bela 5% extra discount cha. App ma exclusive deals ra fast checkout experience pani cha.

question: Packaging eco-friendly cha?
context: Sustainability Policy: All our packaging materials are made from 100% recyclable materials and are eco-friendly.
response: Ho, hamro packaging 100% recyclable materials bata baneko ra eco-friendly cha.

question: Payment fail bhaye aba ke garne?
context: Failed Payment Policy: If a payment fails, the amount will be auto-refunded within 3-5 working days. Contact support if the issue persists.
response: Payment fail bhaye amount 3-5 working din vitra auto-refund huncha. Problem continue bhaye support team lai samparka garnus.

question: Yo product ko ingredients k-kasto cha?
context:
Product: Organic Green Tea
Ingredients: 100% organic green tea leaves. No added preservatives or artificial flavors.
response: Yo product ma 100% organic green tea leaves cha. Koi preservatives ra artificial flavors chaina.

question: Same-day delivery ko option cha?
context: Shipping Policy: Same-day delivery is available only for selected locations inside Kathmandu Valley for orders placed before 12:00 PM. Additional charges apply.
response: Yes, same-day delivery Kathmandu Valley vitra matra available cha, tara order 12:00 PM agadi place garnu parcha. Extra charges lagcha.

question: Payment ko confirmation kasari aauchha?
context: Payment Confirmation: A payment confirmation email and SMS are sent immediately after a successful transaction.
response: Payment successful bhayepachi email ra SMS confirmation turuntai aauchha.

question: Gift voucher return garna milcha?
context: Gift Voucher Policy: Gift vouchers are non-refundable and cannot be exchanged for cash or other vouchers.
response: Dukhit chaun, gift voucher return ya cash ma exchange garna mildaina.

question: Multiple items order garna milcha?
context: Order Policy: Customers can add multiple items to the cart and place a single order. Shipping costs depend on the total weight and destination.
response: Yes, multiple items cart ma add garera ekai order ma kinna sakincha. Shipping cost total weight ra destination ma depend garcha.

question: Old items exchange program cha?
context: Exchange Program: Customers can exchange old electronics for store credit. Items must be in working condition. Evaluation takes 3-5 days.
response: Yes, old electronics exchange garera store credit linna milcha. Items working condition ma hunuparcha, ra evaluation 3-5 din lagcha.

question: Order modify garna milcha?
context: Modification Policy: Orders can be modified before they are shipped. Once shipped, modifications are not allowed.
response: Shipment bhanda pahile order modify garna milcha. Shipment bhayepachi modification garna mildaina.

question: Free shipping ko condition kasto cha?
context: Shipping Policy: Free shipping is available for orders above NPR 3,000 within Kathmandu Valley. Outside the valley, additional charges apply.
response: Kathmandu Valley vitra NPR 3,000 bhanda mathi ko order ma free shipping available cha. Valley bahira extra charges lagcha.

question: COD ko limit kati cha?
context: Payment Policy: Cash on Delivery (COD) is available for orders up to NPR 50,000.
response: COD NPR 50,000 samma ko orders ma available cha.

question: Warranty claim kasari garne?
context: Warranty Claim Process: Submit the warranty card and proof of purchase to the service center. Warranty is applicable only for manufacturing defects.
response: Warranty claim garna warranty card ra proof of purchase service center ma submit garnu parcha. Warranty sirf manufacturing defects ma lagcha.

question: Product restock kahile huncha?
context: Stock Updates: Out-of-stock items are restocked based on demand. Customers can subscribe for restock alerts on the product page.
response: Out-of-stock item demand anusar restock huncha. Tapai product page ma restock alert ko lagi subscribe garna saknu huncha.

question: Customer support ko time k ho?
context: Support Hours: Our customer support team is available from 9:00 AM to 7:00 PM, Monday to Saturday.
response: Hamro customer support team Monday dekhi Saturday samma 9:00 AM dekhi 7:00 PM samma available huncha.

question: Bulk order ko discount kasto cha?
context: Bulk Orders: For bulk purchases, discounts are available based on the quantity. Contact sales@store.com for details.
response: Bulk order ma quantity anusar discount dincha. Thap jankari ko lagi sales@store.com ma samparka garnus.

question: Delivery time ma delay bhaye aba ke garne?
context: Delivery Policy: In case of delays, contact customer support with your order ID. We will assist you in tracking the order.
response: Delivery delay bhaye, tapai ko order ID liyera customer support lai samparka garnus. Hamile order track garna madat garnecha.

question: Mobile app ko exclusive features k-kasto cha?
context: Mobile App Features: App users get early access to sales, app-only discounts, and push notifications for new deals.
response: Mobile app users lai sales ma early access, app-only discounts, ra naya deals ko notification dincha.

question: Coupon code kasari use garne?
context: Coupon Code Usage: Apply the coupon code at checkout in the 'Apply Coupon' section. Discount will be deducted automatically.
response: Coupon code 'Apply Coupon' section ma checkout garepachi laganu parcha. Discount auto deduct huncha.

question: New account banayera k benefits milcha?
context: New User Benefits: New users get NPR 500 off on their first order above NPR 2,000. Signup bonus is automatically applied.
response: New users lai NPR 2,000 bhanda mathi ko first order ma NPR 500 discount dincha. Signup bonus auto apply huncha.

question: Damaged item ko replacement kati din ma huncha?
context: Replacement Policy: Replacements for damaged items are processed within 7-10 working days after the complaint is verified.
response: Damaged item ko replacement complain verify bhayepachi 7-10 working din ma process huncha.

question: Product ko EMI option cha?
context: Payment Options: EMI (Equated Monthly Installment) is available for selected products. Minimum purchase amount is NPR 20,000.
response: Yes, EMI option selected products ma available cha. Minimum purchase amount NPR 20,000 hunuparcha.

question: Refund bank account ma deposit huna kati time lagcha?
context: Refund Policy: Refunds to a bank account take 5-7 working days. For any delays, contact customer support.
response: Refund bank account ma deposit huna 5-7 working din lagcha. Delay bhaye customer support lai samparka garnus.

question: Loyalty points kasari earn garna sakincha?
context: Loyalty Program: Customers earn 1 point for every NPR 100 spent. Points can be redeemed for discounts on future purchases. 100 points = NPR 10 discount.
response: Tapai har NPR 100 ko purchase ma 1 loyalty point earn garnu huncha. 100 points le NPR 10 ko discount dincha. Points future purchases ma redeem garna sakincha.

question: Delivery location change garna milcha?
context: Address Change Policy: Delivery address can be changed before the order is shipped. Once shipped, address modification is not possible.
response: Shipment bhanda pahile delivery location change garna milcha. Shipment bhayepachi change garna mildaina.

question: Product ko stock update kahile huncha?
context: Stock Update Policy: Stock is updated in real-time. If an item is out of stock, customers can request to be notified once it becomes available.
response: Stock real-time ma update huncha. Out-of-stock item available bhaye notification ko lagi request garna sakincha.

question: Delivery tracking update kaha herna sakincha?
context: Tracking Updates: Tracking updates are provided via SMS and email. You can also check the status on the 'Track Order' page using your order ID.
response: Tracking update SMS ra email ma pathaunecha. Tapai 'Track Order' page ma order ID use garera status pani check garna sakincha.

question: Pre-order ko payment kasari garne?
context: Pre-order Payment Policy: Full payment is required at the time of placing a pre-order. Payment can be made via card, e-wallet, or bank transfer.
response: Pre-order place garne bela full payment garnu parcha. Card, e-wallet, ya bank transfer bata payment garna sakincha.

question: Partnership ma product promote garna milcha?
context: Affiliate Program: Our affiliate program allows individuals to promote products and earn commission on sales. Contact affiliates@store.com for details.
response: Yes, affiliate program ko madhyam bata product promote garera commission earn garna sakincha. Thap jankari ko lagi affiliates@store.com ma samparka garnus.

question: Out-of-stock product reserve garna milcha?
context: Reservation Policy: Out-of-stock products cannot be reserved. Customers can sign up for restock notifications instead.
response: Dukhit chaun, out-of-stock product reserve garna mildaina. Tara restock notification ko lagi signup garna sakincha.

question: Warranty ko duration kati ho?
context: Warranty Policy: This product comes with a 1-year manufacturer warranty covering defects and malfunctions.
response: Yo product 1 barsha ko manufacturer warranty sanga aauchha, jun defects ra malfunctions ma lagcha.

question: Order ko invoice kasari download garna sakincha?
context: Invoice Details: Invoices can be downloaded from your account under the 'Order History' section. Click on 'Download Invoice'.
response: Tapai ko account ko 'Order History' section ma janus ra 'Download Invoice' click garnus.

question: Referral program ko validity kati din ho?
context: Referral Program: Referral codes are valid for 30 days from the date of generation. Both parties must complete a purchase to avail benefits.
response: Referral code generate bhayeko 30 din samma valid huncha. Dui jana le purchase complete garnu parcha benefit pauna ko lagi.

question: Eco-friendly packaging request kasari garne?
context: Eco-Friendly Options: Select 'Eco-Friendly Packaging' at checkout. An additional charge of NPR 50 applies.
response: Checkout garepachi 'Eco-Friendly Packaging' option select garnus. Isko lagi NPR 50 extra charge lagcha.

question: Mero wallet balance kasari check garna sakincha?
context: Wallet Features: Wallet balance can be checked in your account under the 'Wallet' section. Transaction history is also available.
response: Tapai wallet ko balance 'Wallet' section ma account bhitra check garna sakincha. Transaction history pani available cha.

question: Festival sale ma EMI option available cha?
context: Festival Sale EMI: EMI options are available during festival sales for purchases above NPR 20,000. EMI rates depend on the bank.
response: Festival sale ko bela EMI option NPR 20,000 bhanda mathi ko purchases ma available cha. EMI rates bank anusar hunchha.

question: Order cancel bhayepachi refund kati din lagcha?
context: Refund Policy: Refunds for canceled orders are processed within 3-5 working days to the original payment method.
response: Canceled orders ko refund original payment method ma 3-5 working din vitra process huncha.

question: Product exchange process kasari cha?
context: Exchange Policy: To exchange a product, fill out the exchange form available on the website. The product must be unused and in original packaging.
response: Product exchange garna ko lagi website ma available exchange form fill garnu parcha. Product unused ra original packaging ma hunuparcha.

question: New arrivals section kaha cha?
context: Product Categories: The 'New Arrivals' section is accessible from the homepage or under the 'Shop' menu.
response: 'New Arrivals' section homepage bata ya 'Shop' menu bhitra access garna sakincha.

question: Customized product return garna milcha?
context: Return Policy: Customized products cannot be returned unless they are defective or damaged.
response: Customized products defective ya damaged bhaye matra return garna milcha.

question: Item dispatch ko SMS kahile aauchha?
context: Dispatch Notification: SMS notification is sent immediately once the item is dispatched. Tracking details are included in the SMS.
response: Item dispatch bhayepachi turuntai SMS pathaunecha, jasma tracking details samet huncha.

question: Store visit garera pickup garna milcha?
context: Pickup Policy: Store pickup is available for selected items. Choose 'Store Pickup' at checkout and select the preferred store location.
response: Selected items ko lagi store visit garera pickup garna milcha. Checkout garepachi 'Store Pickup' option select garnus ra location choose garnus.

question: Order splitting possible cha?
context: Order Policy: Orders cannot be split once placed. Multiple items must be shipped together.
response: Dukhit chaun, ek choti order place bhayepachi split garna mildaina. Multiple items ekai choti ship huncha.

question: Delivery ta time ma aaudaina ni, aba ke garne?
context: Hamro delivery policy anusar, normal delivery ta 3-5 working din lagcha, tara kahile kahi unexpected situation jasto weather problem ya high demand ko karan le delay huna sakcha. Aba yesto case ma tapai hamro customer support lai order ID dinu hunecha, ani hamile delivery partner sanga contact garera status update dinchau. Tapai hamro 'Track Order' page bata status pani herna sakincha. Delivery delay vayo bhane tapai lai compensation ko barema pani sochinchha, policy anusar.
response: Delivery delay bhaye, order ID liyera hamro customer support sanga contact garnus. Hamile delivery partner sanga kura garera update dinchau. Aba chai 'Track Order' page pani check garnus.

question: Payment garna ta garo cha, aru sajilo option chaina?
context: Hamro store ma payment ko lagi dherai sajilo options cha. Tapai online payment garna saknu huncha jasma credit card, debit card, e-wallet jasto esewa ra Khalti use garna milcha. Cash on delivery (COD) ko option pani cha, tara COD NPR 50,000 samma ko order ma matra available huncha. Bank transfer pani garna milcha, jun slightly slow process ho, tara secure cha. Aba chai tapai lai kunai confusion cha bhane, hamro payment support team le madat garna sakcha.
response: Tapai COD ko option try garnus, ya chai esewa ra Khalti jasto e-wallet use garnus. Kunai confusion cha bhane hamro support team sanga contact garnus.

question: Damaged item pathayo, aba ke garna parcha?
context: Hamro damaged item ko policy anusar, tapai ko product damaged delivery bhayo bhane 7 din vitra complain register garna parcha. Complain register garna ko lagi hamro website ma 'Report Issue' form fill garnus, ya chai customer support ma directly message pathaunus. Damaged product ko photo attach garnu naparnecha verification ko lagi. Verification bhayepachi, 5-7 working din vitra replacement ya refund process huncha. Policy anusar product unused ra original packaging ma hunu parcha.
response: Damaged item ko complain register garnus hamro 'Report Issue' form bata. Product ko photo attach garnus, ani hamro team le process garera replacement ya refund dincha.

question: Out-of-stock product ko lagi order kasari garnu?
context: Out-of-stock item directly order garna mildaina, tara tapai hamro 'Notify Me' option use garna sakincha. Yo option product page ma available cha, ani product restock bhaye sanga tapai lai turuntai email ya SMS pathaunecha. Restock ko timing demand anusar huncha, so specific time dinu ta milena, tara maximum 2-3 weeks bhitra most products restock huncha. Aba chai specific product ko barema janna support team lai sodhna saknu huncha.
response: 'Notify Me' button press garnus product page ma, ani product restock bhaye pachi tapai lai email ya SMS ma update aauchha.

question: Order cancel garna cha, aba paisa refund kahile aauchha?
context: Hamro cancellation policy anusar, tapai ko order cancel request process bhayepachi refund original payment method ma 3-5 working din ma aauchha. Tara COD order bhaye bank account detail provide garnu parcha, jun refund form ma submit garna parcha. Refund process ma thoda delay bhaye bhane tapai hamro support team sanga contact garera status bujhna saknu huncha. Yo refund processing sabai secure gateway use gareko hunale 100% safe cha.
response: Order cancel request process bhayepachi, refund 3-5 working din ma aauchha. COD ko lagi chai bank account detail provide garnus.

question: Bulk order ma aru extra discount milcha ki?
context: Hamro bulk order policy ko anusar, tapai le dherai quantity ma order gareko bhaye extra discount dincha. Discount ko percentage chai order ko quantity ra product type ma depend garcha. Bulk order ko lagi tapai sales@store.com ma email garera quote magna saknu huncha. Aba chai shipping ma pani thoda flexibility milcha bulk orders ko lagi. Tapai lai thap details chahiyo bhane hamro support sanga contact garna sakincha.
response: Bulk order ma quantity anusar extra discount milcha. Sales@store.com ma email pathaera quote magnus, ani thap information paunus.

question: EMI option ma kun bank sanga partner cha?
context: Hamro EMI policy anusar, EMI option chai selected products ko lagi matra available cha. Aba chai partner banks jasma Himalayan Bank, Nabil Bank, ra NIC Asia Bank samet parcha, EMI ko facility dincha. EMI process garna minimum purchase NPR 20,000 hunuparcha. Aba tapai le kun bank sanga connect garnu huncha bhanera checkout garepachi option select garna sakincha. Thap details ko lagi EMI support team sanga contact garna milcha.
response: Hamro EMI partner banks ma Himalayan Bank, Nabil Bank, ra NIC Asia Bank cha. Minimum purchase NPR 20,000 ma EMI apply garna milcha.

question: Product review post garna cha, aba kasari?
context: Hamro website ko product page ma tapai le 'Write a Review' section dekhnuhunecha. Aba chai tapai le review likhna product ko rating dinu parcha (1-5 stars) ani feedback. Review post garna ko lagi account ma logged-in hunu parcha. Verified purchase ko lagi review post gareko bhane discount coupon pani milcha future purchase ko lagi. Aba specific review guidelines jasma respectful ra relevant hunu parcha, sabai reviews 24-48 hours vitra approve garincha.
response: Product page ma 'Write a Review' section kholnus, ani feedback ra rating dinus. Verified purchase bhayo bhane discount coupon pani milcha.

question: Festival offer chai kun products ma lagcha?
context: Hamro festival offer selected categories ma lagcha, jasma electronics, fashion, ra home appliances cover garcha. Aba chai specific deals ko lagi tapai hamro 'Deals' section ma jana sakincha website ma. Offer ko validity chai specific festival ko date anusar hunchha, tara mostly 7-10 din samma chalcha. Aba chai offers limited stock ma hunale jaldi order garna recommend garchau. Thap information ko lagi support team sanga contact garnus.
response: Festival offers electronics, fashion, ra home appliances ma available cha. 'Deals' section ma hernus ani jaldi order garnus.

question: Wallet ko paisa kasari use garne?
context: Hamro wallet system anusar, tapai ko wallet ma paisa add bhayeko cha bhane checkout ko bela 'Use Wallet Balance' option select garna sakincha. Aba chai wallet ko paisa ko lagi expiry policy pani cha, jasma paisa 1 barsha vitra use garnu parcha. Wallet ko balance herna tapai 'My Wallet' section ma account bhitra janus. Paisa ko history ya koi issues cha bhane hamro support team le assist garna sakcha.
response: Checkout garepachi 'Use Wallet Balance' option select garnus. Wallet balance herna 'My Wallet' section ma janus.

question: Return garna ta dherai time lagcha hola, fast process garna mildaina?
context: Hamro return process chai normally 7-10 din lagcha. Product return ko lagi, tapai le hamro website ma 'Return Request' form fill garna parcha. Aba chai product inspect garna time lagcha, ani refund ya replacement process suru hunchha. Tara, agar product defective ya damaged ho bhane fast track option pani available cha, jun 3-5 working din vitra complete huncha. Fast track ko lagi, photo ya video evidence attach garnu parcha. Shipping charge refund policy ma include cha jun specific cases ma apply hunchha.
response: Fast track return process ko lagi, defective product ko photo ya video upload garnus. Normally 7-10 din lagcha, tara fast track ma 3-5 din vitra complete huncha.

question: Harek item ko delivery charge kin alag cha?
context: Delivery charge ko calculation chai product ko weight, size, ani delivery location ma depend garcha. Heavy ya large items ko delivery charge thulo huncha because shipping partner le freight rate use garcha. Same city ma delivery bhaye sasto charge huncha, tara remote areas ma delivery ko lagi extra charge lagna sakcha. Tapai ko cart ma total delivery charge checkout page ma clearly dekhauncha.
response: Delivery charge product ko weight, size, ra location ma depend garcha. Checkout page ma total charge clear huncha.

question: Offer ma liyaune product genuine ho ki fake?
context: Hamro store ma sabai products 100% genuine ani authorized suppliers bata sourced huncha. Offer ma diye ko products ko quality same huncha jasto normal priced items. Aba chai hamro warranty ya return policy ma offer ko products pani covered huncha. Fake product ko complain case ta confirm bhayeko chaina, tara hamro support team ready cha kunai issue solve garna.
response: Offer ma diye ko products pani 100% genuine huncha. Kunai doubt cha bhane, hamro support team lai sodhnus.

question: Gift wrapping option cha ki?
context: Hamro store ma gift wrapping ko option available cha, jasma tapai checkout garepachi 'Add Gift Wrapping' ko option select garna sakincha. Gift wrap ko lagi NPR 100 ko extra charge lagcha, ani tapai ko product ramro packaging ma send hunchha. Personalized message add garna ko lagi 50 paisa extra charge lagcha. Gift wrap ko lagi additional 1 din process time lagna sakcha.
response: Checkout ma 'Add Gift Wrapping' option select garnus. Yo NPR 100 ko extra charge ma available cha, ani message add garnus bhane 50 paisa extra lagcha.

question: COD ma card use garna milcha?
context: Cash on Delivery (COD) ko policy anusar, COD ma card use garna mildaina. COD ko payment chai cash ma matra hunchha. Tara, tapai online payment ma switch garna saknu huncha, jasma debit/credit card, e-wallet, ra bank transfer use garna milcha. Agar COD select bhayepachi card use garna cha bhane, order cancel garera naya order place garna parcha online payment sanga.
response: COD ma card use garna mildaina. Tapai online payment option use garnus ya order cancel garera naya order place garnus.

question: Sale ma exchange policy apply huncha?
context: Sale items ko exchange policy normal products jastai cha, tara exchange ko lagi stock availability check garna parcha. Stock available bhaye matra exchange process hunchha. Aba chai tapai le 7 din bhitra exchange request garnu parcha. Agar sale item defective cha bhane refund ya replacement sabai process normal products jastai huncha.
response: Sale items ma pani exchange policy applicable cha, tara stock available bhaye matra. Request 7 din bhitra garnus.

question: Order customize garna sakinchha?
context: Hamro customize policy anusar, certain items customize garna milcha, jastai T-shirts ma text ya design add garna, ya gift items ma personalized message include garna. Customization process ko lagi extra charge lagna sakcha, ani processing time 2-3 din additional huncha. Customization once confirmed bhaye cancel garna mildaina. Thap details ko lagi, tapai customization page ma janus ya support team sanga contact garnus.
response: Customize garna milcha jastai T-shirt ma text add garna. Customize confirm bhaye cancel garna mildaina, ani 2-3 din time lagcha.

question: Hamro address update garna milcha ki?
context: Order ship hunu agadi tapai ko address update garna milcha. Address change ko lagi, account settings ma gayera address edit garnus. Aba chai kunai specific order ko address update garna cha bhane, 'My Orders' section ma address change request send garnus. Shipment already bhayepachi address change garna mildaina.
response: Ship hunu agadi address change garna milcha. Account settings ma update garnus ya 'My Orders' ma request send garnus.

question: Refund direct bank ma aauchha ki wallet ma?
context: Hamro refund policy anusar, online payment gareko bhaye refund direct bank account ya original payment method ma jancha. COD refund ko lagi chai wallet ma credit hunchha. Wallet ko refund use garna flexible huncha, ani tapai chai withdraw garna chahanu huncha bhane bank account detail provide garnu parcha. Refund process 3-7 working din lagna sakcha.
response: Online payment ko refund original method ma jancha. COD ko refund chai wallet ma jancha. Withdraw garna bank detail dinus.

question: International delivery support cha?
context: Hamro international delivery policy anusar, selected countries ma matra delivery cha. Delivery ko lagi extra shipping charge lagna sakcha ani product ko weight ra size anusar rate differ hunchha. Delivery time country anusar 7-15 din samma lagcha. Aba chai tapai specific country ko lagi delivery check garna product page ma 'Check Availability' option use garnus.
response: International delivery selected countries ma available cha. Delivery time 7-15 din lagcha, product page ma 'Check Availability' hernus.

question: Festival ko lagi special packaging cha?
context: Hamro store festival time ma special packaging offer garcha. Aba chai tapai checkout page ma 'Festive Packaging' option select garera add garna sakincha. Yo packaging ko lagi NPR 150 extra charge huncha. Festive packaging ko lagi extra 1 din processing time lagna sakcha.
response: Checkout page ma 'Festive Packaging' option select garnus. NPR 150 extra charge ma yo available cha.

question: Customer care contact number dinus na.
context: Hamro customer care contact number chai 9801234567 ho. Aba chai tapai phone garepachi 9 AM - 6 PM office hours bhitra assistance milcha. Alternative option hisab le live chat ya email (support@store.com) use garna pani sakincha. Phone support weekdays ma matra available cha.
response: Hamro customer care contact number 9801234567 ho. 9 AM - 6 PM office hours ma call garnus, ya email/support chat use garnus.

question: Tracking ID pathaunus na, order kaha pugyo?
context: Hamro tracking system le sabai orders ko status live update garcha. Tapai 'My Orders' section ma janus ani tracking ID ko link click garnus. Delivery status partner courier service ko system sanga linked huncha, so exact location ani estimated delivery time dekhauncha. Aba chai tapai lai kunai confusion cha bhane, tracking ID liyera hamro support sanga contact garna sakincha.
response: Tracking ID ko lagi 'My Orders' section ma janus ani link click garnus. Confusion cha bhane hamro support lai contact garnus.

question: Warranty card pani send huncha ki?
context: Hamro store ko policy anusar, warranty applicable products sanga warranty card pathauncha. Aba chai card directly package bhitra huncha. Online warranty registration required bhaye, hamro product description section ma link provide garincha. Warranty ko duration ra condition product ko type anusar farak huncha. Product description page ma sabai warranty details clearly mentioned huncha.
response: Warranty card package bhitra huncha. Online registration required cha bhane, product page ma mentioned link use garnus.

question: Return request reject huncha ki? Kina?
context: Hamro return policy anusar, product unused ra original packaging ma hunuparcha. Aba chai yesto case ma return request reject huncha jasto damaged product user le garera ho, ya return timeline (7 din) exceed bhaye. Verification ko lagi hamro team le photo ya video ma inspect garcha. Agar rejection reason clear chahiyo bhane, email ma hamro team le detailed explanation provide garcha.
response: Return request unused ra timeline vitra hunuparcha. Reject huncha bhane detailed explanation email ma aauchha.

question: Offer ko validity date kahile samma ho?
context: Hamro offers ko validity specific campaign ko date anusar hunchha. Tapai le 'Deals & Offers' section ma sabai active offers ko end date herna sakincha. Aba chai flash sales ya one-day deals ta limited time ma matra available huncha. Validity date expire bhaye automatic offer remove huncha checkout page bata.
response: 'Deals & Offers' section ma offer validity date check garnus. Flash sales chai limited time ma huncha.

question: Delivery ma cash ra card mix garna milcha?
context: Cash on Delivery (COD) ko option chai pure cash ma matra valid huncha. Cash ra card mix payment COD ma support gardaina. Aba chai online payment choose garepachi matra card use garna milcha. Hybrid payment system yet implement bhayeko chaina. Tapai lai card use garna cha bhane order online payment method ma switch garna saknu huncha.
response: COD ma cash ra card mix garna mildaina. Hybrid payment yet available chaina. Online payment select garnus card use garna.

question: Damaged product replace bhayeko confirm kasari garna?
context: Damaged product ko replacement ko lagi hamro system le request register garera processing ko confirmation email ya SMS send garcha. Aba chai replacement dispatch hune bela tracking ID provide garincha. Replacement process 3-7 working din samma lagcha. Tapai ko order status 'My Orders' section ma pani check garna sakincha. Kunai issue cha bhane support sanga contact garnus.
response: Replacement dispatch bhayepachi tracking ID send hunchha. 'My Orders' ma status check garnus ani confirmation hernus.

question: Gift card kasari use garne?
context: Hamro store ma gift card use garna checkout ko bela 'Apply Gift Card' option select garnus. Tapai sanga card ko unique code hunuparcha. Code enter garera tapai ko total amount ma deduction dekhincha. Gift card ko validity date check garnus, aba expired card ko refund ya extension possible chaina. Gift card balance herna 'My Account' ma login garna sakincha.
response: Checkout ma 'Apply Gift Card' select garnus ani code enter garnus. Validity date confirm garnus, expired card extend haina.

question: Delivery kaha samma free cha?
context: Hamro store ma free delivery certain purchase amount (NPR 2,000+) ko lagi available cha. Remote areas ma delivery ko lagi additional charge lagna sakcha, jun checkout page ma specify hunchha. Aba chai tapai order NPR 2,000 ko tala cha bhane standard delivery charge lagcha. Delivery charge ko details product description page ma mention huncha.
response: NPR 2,000+ purchase ma free delivery huncha. Remote areas ma extra charge lagna sakcha, checkout ma confirm garnus.

question: Coupon code apply huncha ki sabai items ma?
context: Coupon code ko applicability chai items anusar farak hunchha. Certain categories jastai sale items ya discounted products ma coupon valid hudaina. Aba chai eligible items ma coupon code apply garepachi total amount deduct huncha. Coupon ko terms & conditions product page ma mentioned huncha.
response: Sabai items ma coupon valid hudaina, sale items ma ta apply hudaina. Eligible items ma code try garnus ani confirm huncha.

question: Product ko size herna kasari?
context: Hamro website ma sabai products ko size guide mentioned cha, jastai apparel ma size chart cha, ani electronics ma dimension details. Tapai product page ma 'Size Guide' button click garera details herna sakincha. Aba confusion cha bhane hamro support team le size selection ma assist garcha.
response: Product page ma 'Size Guide' button click garnus. Confusion cha bhane hamro support team lai sodhnus.

question: Pre-order ko lagi advance payment garnu parcha?
context: Hamro pre-order system anusar, tapai le product confirm garna advance payment garnu parcha. Advance ko percentage product ko total amount anusar vary garcha, aba normally 20%-30% huncha. Remaining payment chai product dispatch bhanda pahile garnu parcha. Pre-order ko delivery timeline product page ma clearly mentioned cha.
response: Pre-order confirm garna 20%-30% advance payment garnus. Remaining payment dispatch bhanda pahile garnu parcha.

question: Account delete garna parcha, aba kasari?
context: Hamro privacy policy anusar, account delete garna ko lagi tapai 'My Account' settings ma janus. Aba chai 'Delete Account' ko option select garnus ani confirmation process complete garnus. Delete bhaye pachi data permanently remove hunchha. Account delete garepachi orders ya refunds ko lagi access possible hudaina, so confirm garera delete garnus.
response: 'My Account' ma 'Delete Account' option select garnus. Confirm garnus ani account delete huncha, sabai data permanently remove huncha.

question: Delivery delay bha jasto cha, kati dinma aauxa?
context: Delivery timeline normally 3-5 working din ho domestic delivery ko lagi, ani remote areas ma 7-10 din samma lagcha. Aba chai weather ya transportation ko issues le extra delay huncha. Tapai ko order ko status track garna 'My Orders' section ma janus ani tracking link click garnus. Delay confirm bhaye bhane, hamro support team le courier partner sanga contact garera update provide garcha.
response: Domestic delivery 3-5 din lagcha, remote areas ma 7-10 din. Delay cha bhane 'My Orders' ma tracking hernus ani support sanga contact garnus.

question: Public holiday ma pani delivery huncha ki?
context: Hamro delivery service ko schedule chai working days ma depend garcha. Aba chai major public holidays jastai Dashain, Tihar, ya government-declared holidays ma delivery stop huncha. Courier partners ko operational hours holiday ko din ma reduce huna sakcha. Holiday ma orders dispatch huna sakcha tara delivery next working day ma matra hunchha.
response: Public holiday ma delivery normally stop huncha. Orders dispatch huncha, tara delivery working day ma huncha.

question: Same-day delivery ko lagi kei extra charge huncha?
context: Hamro same-day delivery service urban areas jastai Kathmandu, Lalitpur, ani Bhaktapur ma matra available cha. Aba chai same-day delivery ko lagi NPR 200-300 ko extra charge lagcha depending on location. Order chai 11 AM bhitra place garnu parcha same-day delivery ko lagi. Remote areas ma same-day delivery service available chaina.
response: Same-day delivery urban areas ma matra cha. NPR 200-300 extra charge lagcha, ani order 11 AM bhitra garnu parcha.

question: Order collect garna delivery center ma jaan milcha?
context: Hamro delivery partners pickup center ko option support garcha. Tapai le checkout ko bela 'Pickup from Delivery Center' option select garnu parcha. Order dispatch bhaye pachi tapai lai SMS ya email ma collection time ra location ko details send garincha. Pickup center ma order collect garna photo ID required hunchha.
response: 'Pickup from Delivery Center' option select garnus. Dispatch pachi SMS ma location aauchha, ID sanga collect garnus.

question: Evening delivery ko option cha ki?
context: Evening delivery ko option currently Kathmandu valley ma matra available cha. Tapai checkout ma 'Evening Delivery' select garnu saknu huncha, ani delivery time 5 PM dekhi 8 PM samma hunchha. Evening delivery ko lagi NPR 100 extra charge lagcha. Aba chai order same-day ko lagi eligible cha bhane, tapai lai automatic evening slot ma schedule garincha.
response: Evening delivery Kathmandu valley ma avaFilable cha. NPR 100 extra charge lagcha ani time 5 PM-8 PM samma ho.

question: Remote areas ma delivery kasto huncha?
context: Remote areas ko delivery timeline normally 7-10 working din ho. Aba chai delivery charge remote locations ma thap lagna sakcha due to additional transportation cost. Courier partners chai local delivery agents ko madhyam bata order deliver garcha. Tracking ID le status update dincha, aba confusion cha bhane hamro support team lai sodhnus.
response: Remote areas ma delivery 7-10 din lagcha. Additional charge lagna sakcha, tracking ID use garera status hernus.

question: Weekend ma delivery huncha ki?
context: Weekend ma delivery urban locations jastai Kathmandu, Lalitpur, ani Bhaktapur ma continue huncha. Aba chai remote areas ma weekend ma courier partners le delivery support gardaina. Weekend ma order dispatch normally hunchha, tara delivery next working day ma complete huncha. Tapai ko order status 'My Orders' section ma check garnus.
response: Urban areas ma weekend ma delivery huncha, tara remote areas ma working day matra. 'My Orders' ma status check garnus.

question: Address galat halyo, aba k garne?
context: Agar address galat cha bhane, shipment dispatch hunu agadi address update garna sakincha. 'My Orders' section ma janus ani order details ma 'Change Address' option select garnus. Shipment already dispatch bhaye pachi address change garna mildaina, tara courier partner lai request garera alternate delivery arrange garna sakinchha. For urgent cases, support team sanga contact garnus.
response: Dispatch agadi 'Change Address' option use garnus. Dispatch bhayepachi support sanga contact garera alternate delivery ko lagi request garnus.

question: Heavy items ko delivery ma extra charge lagcha ki?
context: Hamro delivery charge policy anusar, heavy items (15kg+ weight) ko lagi extra charge lagcha. Aba chai delivery charge weight, dimension, ani destination location anusar vary garcha. Heavy items ko packaging pani special huncha, so additional handling charge lagna sakcha. Checkout page ma total charge automatically calculate hunchha.
response: Heavy items ko delivery ma extra charge lagcha. Weight ra location anusar charge vary huncha, checkout page ma details hernus.

question: International delivery kasto huncha?
context: International delivery ko lagi specific courier partners use garincha. Delivery timeline country anusar 7-15 working din lagcha. Customs clearance ko lagi additional charge lagna sakcha, jun receiver le pay garnu parcha. Hamro international shipping selected countries ma matra available cha, ani checkout ko bela eligible countries ko list dekhna milcha.
response: International delivery 7-15 working din lagcha. Customs clearance ko lagi charge lagna sakcha, eligible countries checkout page ma hernus.

question: Delivery ko lagi contactless option cha?
context: Hamro delivery partners le contactless delivery support garcha, jun COVID-19 safety measures ko part ho. Tapai le checkout page ma 'Contactless Delivery' option select garnu parcha. Delivery ko bela package safe location ma rakhincha, ani confirmation ko lagi tapai ko SMS ya call ma verification huncha.
response: 'Contactless Delivery' checkout page ma select garnus. Package safe location ma deliver hunchha ani confirmation SMS ya call ma huncha.

question: Delivery partner lai direct contact garna milcha?
context: Delivery ko bela courier partner ko contact number SMS ya email ma pathauncha. Aba chai partner lai direct call garera delivery timing ya location coordinate garna sakincha. Kunai issue cha bhane, hamro support team le pani courier partner sanga communicate garera update provide garcha.
response: Courier partner ko contact number SMS ma pathauncha. Direct call garera coordinate garnus ya support team lai sodhnus.

question: Cash on Delivery confirm garna parcha ki?
context: COD order confirm garna parcha junko lagi tapai le order place garepachi SMS ya call ma verify garnu parcha. Aba verification complete nagare bhane order cancel huna sakcha. Verification process customer security ko lagi cha, ani timing ma confirm garera COD ensure garnus.
response: COD order confirm garnus SMS ya call ma. Verification nagare bhane order cancel huna sakcha.
